systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

defaultConnectionProfile.Description: Connection profile for how users connect to lab virtual machines.

defaultAutoShutdownProfile.Description: Profile for how to handle shutting down virtual machines.

defaultNetworkProfile.Description: Profile for how to handle networking for Lab Plans.

allowedRegions.Description: The allowed regions for the lab creator to use when creating labs using this lab plan.

webSshAccess.Description: A connection type for access labs and VMs (Public, Private or None).

webRdpAccess.Description: A connection type for access labs and VMs (Public, Private or None).

clientSshAccess.Description: A connection type for access labs and VMs (Public, Private or None).

clientRdpAccess.Description: A connection type for access labs and VMs (Public, Private or None).

shutdownOnIdle.Description: Defines whether to shut down VM on idle and the criteria for idle detection.

disconnectDelay.Description: The amount of time a VM will stay running after a user disconnects if this behavior is enabled.

noConnectDelay.Description: The amount of time a VM will stay running before it is shutdown if no connection is made and this behavior is enabled.

idleDelay.Description: The amount of time a VM will idle before it is shutdown if this behavior is enabled.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

plan.Description: The ID of marketplace plan associated with the image (optional).

offer.Description: The ID of an offer associated with the image.

publisher.Description: The ID of the publisher of the image.

availableRegions.Description: The available regions of the image in the shared gallery.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

networkProfile.Description: Profile for how to handle networking for Labs.

state.Description: The state of a virtual machine.

autoShutdownProfile.Description: Profile for how to handle shutting down virtual machines.

connectionProfile.Description: Connection profile for how users connect to lab virtual machines.

virtualMachineProfile.Description: The base virtual machine configuration for a lab.

rosterProfile.Description: The lab user list management profile.

createOption.Description: Indicates what lab virtual machines are created from.

imageReference.Description: Image reference information. Used in the virtual machine profile.

sku.Description: The resource model definition representing SKU

additionalCapabilities.Description: The additional capabilities for a lab VM.

usageQuota.Description: The initial quota alloted to each lab user. Must be a time span between 0 and 9999 hours.

adminUser.Description: Credentials for a user on a lab VM.

nonAdminUser.Description: Credentials for a user on a lab VM.

version.Description: The image version specified on creation.

exactVersion.Description: The actual version of the image after use.

name.Description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.Description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.Description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.Description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.Description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

username.Description: The username to use when signing in to lab VMs.

password.Description: The password for the user. This is required for the TemplateVM createOption.

registrationCode.Description: The registration code for the lab.

activeDirectoryGroupId.Description: The AAD group ID which this lab roster is populated from. Having this set enables AAD sync mode.

ltiContextId.Description: The unique context identifier for the lab in the lms.

lmsInstance.Description: The base URI identifying the lms instance.

ltiClientId.Description: The unique id of the azure lab services tool in the lms.

ltiRosterEndpoint.Description: The uri of the names and roles service endpoint on the lms for the class attached to this lab.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

displayName.Description: Display name of the user, for example user's full name.

invitationSent.Description: Date and time when the invitation message was sent to the user.

totalUsage.Description: How long the user has used their virtual machines in this lab.

additionalUsageQuota.Description: The amount of usage quota time the user gets in addition to the lab usage quota.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

startAt.Description: When lab user virtual machines will be started. Timestamp offsets will be ignored and timeZoneId is used instead.

stopAt.Description: When lab user virtual machines will be stopped. Timestamp offsets will be ignored and timeZoneId is used instead.

recurrencePattern.Description: Recurrence pattern of a lab schedule.

timeZoneId.Description: The IANA timezone id for the schedule.

weekDays.Description: The week days the schedule runs. Used for when the Frequency is set to Weekly.

interval.Description: The interval to invoke the schedule on. For example, interval = 2 and RecurrenceFrequency.Daily will run every 2 days. When no interval is supplied, an interval of 1 is used.

expirationDate.Description: When the recurrence will expire. This date is inclusive.
